document_notes.text:
This update for zstd fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2022-4899: Fixed buffer overrun in util.c (bsc#1209533).
document_notes.title: Details

notes.text: A vulnerability was found in zstd v1.4.10, where an attacker can supply empty string as an argument to the command line tool to cause buffer overrun.
notes.title: Vulnerability Description
